title: Ideal for short stay
text:
My sister and I shared a twin room for a four night stay and found this hotel ideal. Our room was not huge but it was perfectly clean with comfortable beds. Bed linen spotless as was the very large bathroom.
The staff were very friendly and helpful, especially Alex (I hope we have this right) who welcomed us on arrival. He suggested places to go, offered to book taxis and booked a table for us for the Saturday evening at a restaurant of our choice, ensuring we got in, as they are all busy every evening.
The Full Continental breakfasts were lovely with plenty of choice (no Full English - but this is Rome after all!) For those in need of their fry-ups there were places nearby that sold them.
The star rating is not the same as England, but for the price Hotel Gallia was good value for money. Perfect location, within easy walking distance to both Terminus and the Colusseum. Would definitely stay there again.
